wikipedia_page.main: Graham Frost (born 15 January 1947 in Old Basford) is an English former first-class cricketer active 1968–73 who played for Nottinghamshire.

response: He also made a single List A appearance for Minor Counties North against Nottinghamshire in the 1972 Benson & Hedges Cup.  In this match, he took the wicket of Graham Frost for the cost of 36 runs from 11 overs, while with the bat he was dismissed for 4 runs by Bob White, with Nottinghamshire winning by 55 runs.
